name: Emerald Rush
description:
This game is a speed based game . You have to reach the end as fast as possible to get the highest rank . It has two sections . The first one is finding the emerald to steal it and the second part is a high speed chase . You have:

-Double jump

-Dash

-Boost

-Dive Dash

-Dash Climb

-Boost Launch

The abilities are explained in the game.

Have fun!
